{"id":1479097646,"question_id":3686,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1734235126,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1479097646/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Beautiful Splits in an Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const static int p = 101;\n    const static int mod = 1e9+7;\n    int beautifulSplits(vector<int>& nums) {\n        if ((int)nums.size() < 3)\n            return 0;\n\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> hash(N, vector<int> (N, -1));\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            int sum = nums[i];\n            long long pow = p;\n            for (int j=i; j<N; j++) {\n                sum += pow * nums[j];\n                pow = (pow * p) % mod;\n                sum %= mod;\n                hash[i][j] = sum;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n        //     for (int j=0; j<N; j++)\n        //         cout << setw(8) << hash[i][j] << \" \";\n        //     cout << endl;\n        // }\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<N; j++) {\n                if (2*j-i-1 < N && hash[i][j-1] == hash[j][2*j-i-1]) {\n                    // cout << i << \" \" << j << endl;\n                    // cout << (N - (2*j-i)) << endl;\n                    ans += (N - (2*j-i));\n                    if (i) ans++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-beautiful-splits-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":966}
